qa.name: Elias Timecraft
qa.essence: Skilled clockmaker with a desperate mission
qa.appearance: Graying hair, spectacles, and nimble hands

hf.name: Clara Pendulum
hf.essence: Elias's true love, trapped in a time loop
hf.appearance: Ethereal beauty with flowing auburn hair
hf.clothing: Shimmering dress that seems to shift through eras

json_to_edit.voice_over: Time waits for no one, but I'll make it bend for her.
json_to_edit.description: Elias Timecraft races against time to save Clara from an endless loop.
json_to_edit.lighting: Warm, golden glow from various clocks and timepieces
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Ticking clocks, whirring gears, occasional chimes
json_to_edit.name: Clockwork Love
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Elias Timecraft battles time itself to rescue his love, Clara, from a temporal trap.

qa.action: Elias's workshop filled with clocks of all sizes, gears turning in intricate patterns.

hf.action: Elias's determined eyes as he examines a unique pocket watch.

tr.action: Elias assembling a complex timepiece with lightning speed and precision.

xc.action: The workshop starts to spin, clocks floating as time begins to warp.

ka.action: Clara appears, trapped in a shimmering time bubble, reaching out to Elias.

fn.action: Elias struggles against the flow of time, inching towards Clara with his creation.

af.action: The unique pocket watch in Elias's hand strikes midnight, freezing all other clocks.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Time waits for no one, but I'll make it bend for her.
updated_json.description: Elias Timecraft races against time to save Clara from an endless loop.
updated_json.lighting: Warm, golden glow from various clocks and timepieces
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Ticking clocks, whirring gears, occasional chimes
updated_json.name: Clockwork Love
updated_json.scene_summary: Elias Timecraft battles time itself to rescue his love, Clara, from a temporal trap.

qa.action: Elias's workshop filled with clocks of all sizes, gears turning in intricate patterns.

hf.action: Elias's determined eyes as he examines a unique pocket watch.

xc.action: The workshop starts to spin, clocks floating as time begins to warp.

fn.action: Elias struggles against the flow of time, inching towards Clara with his creation.

af.action: The unique pocket watch in Elias's hand strikes midnight, freezing all other clocks.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots "tr" and "ka" from the original list of seven shots. we'll update the "list_display_order" and remove the corresponding shot entries from the "shots" dictionary. the "number_of_shots" will also be updated to reflect the new total. all other information in the json will remain the same.
